headline: Corrections
abstract: Corrections that appeared in print on Friday, Jan. 3, 2020.
lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about Carlos Ghosnâ€™s escape from Japan misstated the total amount Carlos Ghosn paid in bail. It was 1.5 billion yen, or about $13.8 million, not $9 million. The error was repeated in two other articles on Wednesday.
